entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
